# 迭代加深`DFS`

## 原理

见《进阶指南》第`109`页。

## 模板题

[AcWing-170-加成序列](https://www.acwing.com/problem/content/172/)

```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;

const int N = 110;
int n, x[N], max_depth;

bool dfs (int cur) {
    if (cur == max_depth + 1) // 递归边界
        return x[max_depth] == n;
    
    bool mark[N];
    memset(mark, 0, sizeof(mark));
    for (int i = 1; i <= cur - 1; ++ i) {
        for (int j = 1; j <= cur - 1; ++ j) {
            int sum = x[i] + x[j];
            if (mark[sum] == false
                && x[cur - 1] < sum
                && sum <= n
            ) {
                mark[sum] = true;
                x[cur] = sum;
                if (dfs(cur + 1) == true) return true;
            }
        }
    }
    return false;
}

int main () {
    x[1] = 1;
    while (cin >> n && n) {
        max_depth = 1;
        while (dfs(2) == false) ++ max_depth;
        for (int i = 1; i <= max_depth; ++ i)
            cout << x[i] << ' ';
        cout << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
```
